channel.title: bibliometry on Sofia Foladori Invernizzi
channel.description: Recent content in bibliometry on Sofia Foladori Invernizzi

item.title: How are the science and technology journals authorships distributed?
item.description: Scientific publications are concentrated in developed countries, that have the economic power, the most prestigious universities, and the most diffused scientific journals. The investigation agendas are set up by the central countries, such as the United States and some European countries. Consequently, once these countries define the research topics, these are adopted by satellite groups. In this context, we find Latin America and their academic production Objective If we consider the most prestigious journals in Science and technology, from which country are the authors?
